Package main

Class Shop

java.lang.Object
main.Shop
public class Shop extends Object
The class which manages the shop interface; here the player can view generated Items and Athletes for sale, purchase them, or resell unwanted objects from their own roster or inventory. A new shop with new inventory for sale generates each time the main environment's week counter is incremented.

      numberOfPurchasables - Given number of objects to generate of each type.

    • sell

      public void sell(String sellType, boolean reserves, int index)
      Processes resale of a player-owned object.
      Parameters:
      sellType - The type (Athlete, Item) of the object to be sold.
      reserves - Whether the object is a reserve Athlete.
      index - The array index of the object to be sold.
